name: Super Refreshing Watermelon Lemonade
description: This super refreshing pink watermelon lemonade is perfect for hot summer days! It's ready in no time and soo good! You really should give it a try!

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the watermelon in large chunks and put them into a food processor. Blend until smooth. Strain through a fine meshed sieve.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the watermelon in large chunks and put them into a food processor. Blend until smooth. Strain through a fine meshed sieve.

recipeInstructions.text: Juice the lemons and the lime. Add the juice, water, and agave to the pureed watermelon. Blend again for a couple of seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: Juice the lemons and the lime. Add the juice, water, and agave to the pureed watermelon. Blend again for a couple of seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve in a large pitcher together with lots of ice and garnish  with lemon slices and mint leaves.
